languages.text:
Создает небольшую лужу огня размером 3х3.
Юниты находящиеся в этой луже получают урон 8-12 ед огненного урона и накладывается Варп-Горение 6

traits.locale_text:
Создает небольшую лужу огня размером 3х3.
Юниты находящиеся в этой луже получают урон 8-12 ед огненного урона и накладывается Варп-Горение 6

languages.text: This creature throws a fire charge at target creature, creating a 3×3 {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers <u>(from 10 to 12)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and burning (6).
languages.original_text: Это существо бросает в цель огненный заряд, создавая область {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} 3×3 на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Когда любое существо перемещается в эту область (или находится там в момент ее появления), оно получает <u>(от 10 до 12)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 50%, а также горение (6).

traits.locale_text: This creature throws a fire charge into a target creating a 3×3 burning area which lasts for 2 rounds. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers <u>(from 10 to 12)</u> fire damage with 50% armour penetration and burning (6).

This creature throws a fire charge at target creature, creating a 3×3 {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers <u>(from 10 to 12)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and burning (6).

This creature throws a fire charge at target creature, creating a 3×3 {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers <u>(from 10 to 12)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and burning (6).

languages.text: Bu yaratık, hedef yaratığa bir ateş patlayıcısı fırlatarak 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} boyunca süren 3×3'lük {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanan{/g} bir alan oluşturur. Bu alana giren (veya etki uygulandığı anda orada duran) bir yaratık, %50 {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} değerine sahip <u>(10 ila 12)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}ateş hasarı{/g} alır ve yanmaya (6) maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: This creature throws a fire charge at target creature, creating a 3×3 {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers <u>(from 10 to 12)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and burning (6).

traits.locale_text: Bu yaratık, hedef yaratığa bir ateş patlayıcısı fırlatarak 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} boyunca süren 3x3'lük {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanan{/g} bir alan oluşturur. Bu alana giren (veya etki uygulandığı anda orada duran) bir yaratık, %50 {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} değerine sahip <u>(10 ila 12)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}ateş hasarı{/g} alır ve yanmaya (6) maruz kalır.

languages.text: Esta criatura arroja una carga ígnea a una criatura objetivo, creando una zona {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardiente{/g} de 3×3 casillas que dura 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Toda criatura que entre en esta zona (o se encuentre en ella cuando se aplica el efecto) sufre <u>(de 10 a 12)</u> puntos de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} del 50 % y quemadura (6).
languages.original_text: This creature throws a fire charge at target creature, creating a 3×3 {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers <u>(from 10 to 12)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and burning (6).

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura arroja una carga ígnea a una criatura objetivo, creando una zona {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardiente{/g} de 3×3 casillas que dura 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Toda criatura que entre en esta zona (o se encuentre en ella cuando se aplica el efecto) sufre <u>(de 10 a 12)</u> puntos de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} del 50 % y quemadura (6).

languages.text: 此生物向目标生物投掷火焰炸弹，形成一片3x3的{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}区域，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。所有进入燃烧区域的生物（或是手雷爆炸时处于该区域内的生物）都会受到<u>10-12</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}。此次攻击拥有50%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}，同时施加燃烧（6）状态。
languages.original_text: This creature throws a fire charge at target creature, creating a 3×3 {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers <u>(from 10 to 12)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and burning (6).

traits.locale_text: 此生物向目标生物投掷火焰炸弹，形成一片3x3的{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}区域，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。所有进入燃烧区域的生物（或是手雷爆炸时处于该区域内的生物）都会受到<u>10-12</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}。此次攻击拥有50%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}，同时施加燃烧（6）状态。

languages.text: La créature lance une charge enflammée sur la cible, en créant une zone {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardente{/g} de 3×3 cases qui dure 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Toutes les créatures qui y pénètrent ou qui s'y trouvent déjà au moment où l'effet est appliqué subissent <u>de 10 à 12</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} avec 50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}, ainsi que l'effet Combustion (6).
languages.original_text: This creature throws a fire charge at target creature, creating a 3×3 {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers <u>(from 10 to 12)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and burning (6).

traits.locale_text: La créature lance une charge enflammée sur la cible, en créant une zone {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardente{/g} de 3×3 cases qui dure 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Toutes les créatures qui y pénètrent ou qui s'y trouvent déjà au moment où l'effet est appliqué subissent <u>de 10 à 12</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} avec 50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}, ainsi que l'effet Combustion (6).

languages.text: この生物は、ターゲット生物にファイア突撃を行い、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間継続する3×3の{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}エリアを作り出す。このエリアに侵入する（もしくは効果が適用される瞬間にそこに立っている）あらゆる生物は、50%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}を持つ<u>（10～12）</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}と炎上（6）を受ける。
languages.original_text: This creature throws a fire charge at target creature, creating a 3×3 {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers <u>(from 10 to 12)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and burning (6).

traits.locale_text: この生物は、ターゲット生物にファイア突撃を行い、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間継続する3×3の{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}エリアを作り出す。このエリアに侵入する（もしくは効果が適用される瞬間にそこに立っている）あらゆる生物は、50%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}を持つ<u>（10～12）</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}と炎上（6）を受ける。

languages.text: Diese Kreatur wirft eine Feuerladung auf das Ziel und erzeugt einen 3×3 Felder großen {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}brennenden{/g} Bereich, der 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang bestehen bleibt. Kreaturen, die diesen Bereich betreten (oder sich zu Beginn des Effektes darin aufhalten) erleiden <u>(10 bis 12)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} mit 50 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} und Verbrennen (6).
languages.original_text: This creature throws a fire charge at target creature, creating a 3×3 {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers <u>(from 10 to 12)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 50% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and burning (6).

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur wirft eine Feuerladung auf das Ziel und erzeugt einen 3×3 Felder großen {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}brennenden{/g} Bereich, der 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang bestehen bleibt. Kreaturen, die diesen Bereich betreten (oder sich zu Beginn des Effektes darin aufhalten) erleiden <u>(10 bis 12)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} mit 50 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} und Verbrennen (6).

Когда любое существо перемещается в эту область (или находится там в момент ее появления), оно получает <u>(от 10 до 12)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 50%, а также горение (6).

Это существо бросает в цель огненный заряд, создавая область {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} 3×3 на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Когда любое существо перемещается в эту область (или находится там в момент ее появления), оно получает <u>(от 10 до 12)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 50%, а также горение (6).
